players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night. Please vote Bob today."
You: "Charlie, if you’re the detective, why would mafia kill Diana instead of you? Bob, what’s your defense? Also, Charlie, who would you have investigated if not Bob, and why?"

Bob: "Charlie is lying. Killing Diana instead of him makes sense if he’s trying to frame me. Alice, this smells like a gambit. Charlie, who would you have checked if not me, and why Diana over you for the kill?"

You: "Charlie, full claim please: why Diana kill over you, and what’s your exact N1 process and future plan? Bob, give a concrete alt-world: if Charlie’s town, who’s mafia and why? Also, did anyone crumb N1?"
Charlie: remained silent.

Bob: "Charlie’s silent after a full claim request is damning. Alice, if he’s real, he answers. I’m town. My alt-world: Charlie is mafia fake-claiming to rush me. Diana was killed to avoid creating a CC trap. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested
